course_description: This course explores how interactivity opens up possibilities for storytelling by playing narrative-focused games and interactive stories, reading critical and technical literature about mechanics and story structure in published interactive fictions, and experimenting with our own writing.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5276, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: B. Miller, Status: Closed
